title: Love is All We Got: After I Do
description: After fifteen years of marriage, Liz LeBlanc is tired of being ignored by her husband, Remy LeBlanc. When she goes away for the weekend, she realises she has a lot to offer and more so after she is reunited with her old boyfriend from college, the dashing CEO, Devin Olivier. He treats her like the queen that she is and makes Liz question her marriage.Liz has a decision to make: Go back to her husband of fifteen years and give the marriage one last try, or leave everything behind and start anew?
author: Kindra White
